entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:24 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:24 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
